extension.name: System - MOOTOMBO!Framework - System Plugin

extension.description:
This is the MOOTOMBO!Framework - System Plugin which is needed by ALL devXive, XAP and MOOTOMBO private/business apps/extensions. Turning this off may cause a wide list of errors which will be shown on your frontend or backend and is also visible by your visitors.
